body_content.explanation: causing a tingle (= a feeling as if a lot of sharp points are being put lightly into your body):
examples: The massage had left me with a pleasant tingly sensation.
If you get a strange tingly feeling in your nose, there is no need to worry.

body_content.explanation: feeling an emotion such as excitement or fear very strongly:
examples: When I first came here, it gave me a kind of tingly feeling that something special had happened here.
"I get a tingly feeling before every major championships," she said.
